BIO

I am a tireless person, my passion is learning and seeking always to satisfy this passion. I graduated from faculty of commerce class of 2011, and I am working as an accountant in the governmental sector, since my graduation, I tried learning more than one thing and I dive into more than one field till I found out programming ignites through my way. I joined an offline study group, and started working hard to figure out what this new path is about.
